name: Baby Food: Plum
author: cfdwards
summary: Plums are a perfect staple ingredient to baby's diet, as well as great for mixing with several different foods. Plums are good refrigerated for 2 to 3 days or frozen for 3 months.
ingredients: 4  plums - peeled, pitted, and cut into small chunks
directions: Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer
Add plums, cover, and steam until tender, about 10 minutes
Transfer plums to a food processor and blend, adding water from the saucepan as needed, until desired consistency is reached
Allow pureed plums to reach room temperature before serving or freezing
